snippet: The attorney general called on public agencies “to act fast, efficiently and decisively” on sweeping new rules after years of legal battles over the treatment of women.
abstract: Israel’s attorney general advises ministers across government to immediately end gender segregation in public spaces, issuing guidelines that will change many aspects of daily life; ruling comes after years of mounting tension and legal battles over treatment of women in Israel’s public sphere.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general called on public agencies “to act fast, efficiently and decisively” on sweeping new rules after years of legal battles over the treatment of women.

headline.seo: Israel Moves to End Gender Segregation in Public Spaces
